content.query:
-- Fetching CSV data using abfs protocol, Header_Row set to True, FIELDTERMINATOR and ROWTERMINATOR specified
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'calendar.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) WITH (
    date_key INT,
    date DATE,
    year SMALLINT,
    day TINYINT,
    day_name VARCHAR(10),
    day_of_year SMALLINT,
    week_of_month TINYINT,
    week_of_year TINYINT,
    month_name VARCHAR(10),
    year_month INT,
    year_week INT
)AS calendar_results;

USE nyc_taxi_discovery;
SELECT name, location from sys.external_data_sources

SELECT 
    MAX(LEN(date_key)),
    MAX(LEN(date)),
    MAX(LEN(year)),
    MAX(LEN(day)),
    MAX(LEN(day_name)),
    MAX(LEN(day_of_year)),
    MAX(LEN(week_of_month)),
    MAX(LEN(week_of_year)),
    MAX(LEN(month_name)),
    MAX(LEN(year_month)),
    MAX(LEN(year_week))
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'calendar.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) AS calendar_results;

--name, system_type_name, max_length
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT 
TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK ''calendar.csv'',
    DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data'',
    FORMAT = ''CSV'',
    PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) WITH (
    date_key INT,
    date DATE,
    year SMALLINT,
    day TINYINT,
    day_name VARCHAR(10),
    day_of_year SMALLINT,
    week_of_month TINYINT,
    week_of_year TINYINT,
    month_name VARCHAR(10),
    year_month INT,
    year_week INT
)
AS calendar_results';
